code: import React from'react';import{Typography,Avatar,Grid,Box}from"@material-ui/core";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import Typed from"react-typed";import avatar from"../profile-pic.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{avatar:{width:theme.spacing(15),height:theme.spacing(15),margin:theme.spacing(1)},title:{color:"#00e5ff"},subtitle:{color:"#1de9b6",marginBottom:"3rem"},typedContainer:{position:"absolute",top:"50%",left:"50%",transform:"translate(-50%, -50%)",width:"100vw",textAlign:"center",zIndex:1}};});var Header=function Header(){var classes=useStyles();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{className:classes.typedContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,justify:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{className:classes.avatar,src:avatar,alt:"Picture Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{className:classes.title,variant:"h4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typed,{strings:["Welcome to Mario Castro's Portfolio"],typeSpeed:45})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{className:classes.subtitle,variant:"h5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typed,{strings:["Academic Researcher","Translator","Web Developer","Teacher"],typeSpeed:45,backSpeed:55,loop:true})})]});};export default Header;
